column21: Dr. Vipul Baweja started his medical career in 1993 from University College of Medical Sciences & associated Guru Teg Bahadur Hospital, Delhi from where he Graduated in MBBS. During his early years, while working with kids in pediatric wards or in rural health centers of Loni, UP, he developed interest in Child care and he took up Paediatrics as his career in the year 2000 and trained from Kalawati Saran Children Hospital (KSCH) & Lady Hardinge Medical College(LHMC)-Delhi, which is the largest exclusive Paediatric establishment in Asia.   Subsequently, he has served at Hindu Rao Hospital-Delhi(2002-2006), KSCH & LHMC(2006-07) and at Escorts Heart Institute & Research Centre-Delhi(Pediatric Cardiology)(2007-08). All these days he has been known for his sincerity, hard work, and dedication towards patients and their families.  He joined BLK Super Speciality Hospital in 2009 and has been actively involved in general outpatient services, inpatient services, emergencies, etc. He is currently a Consultant in Department of Neonatal Pediatric and Adolescent Medicine and is part of a proud team of Pediatricians under the able mentorship of Dr. S C Arya, Emeritus Consultant Pediatrician.  His aim is to provide a holistic general pediatric care in today’s era of Super Speciality care, where everyone is just having a tubular vision for his/her own specialty and is gradually forgetting the basic integrated care, especially the preventive and promotive aspects of a child’s health.

Dr Kumar Ankur has a special interest in any problems during the first two years of life.

column21: Dr Atul Chopra practices at his clinic in Greater Kailash 2, South Delhi. In the morning hours (mondays to saturdays), he works at Rosewalk Hospital (by Rainbow Hospitals) at Panchsheel Park, South Delhi. He is one of the few newborn and child specialists who have a Fellowship in Neonatology from Mater Mother's Hospital, Brisbane, Australia. He has also worked at Women's and Children's Hospital, Adelaide and Flinders University NICU, Adelaide, both in South Australia. He has been practicing as a Senior Consultant in Neonatology and General Pediatrics for over a decade now and in these years he has taken up some challenging cases.  Not only is Dr. Atul Chopra a renowned neonatologist, he is equally adept at pediatrics. He completed his MBBS and Masters Degree (MD) in Pediatrics from acclaimed Dayanand Medical College & Hospital, Ludhiana (Punjab). Most of the times, patients are very well satisfied with his services. This is because he gives his 100% to each and every patient. He is known to be a disciplined and punctual doctor and tries to see patients on time unless there is a sick/crying child who needs immediate attention.  He is trained well enough to treat and look after Covid infected babies/children, post-operative surgical children who need continuous medical care and growth monitoring. T  Dr Atul Chopra is available in evening hours at his GK2 clinic (6pm to 8pm) and in the morning hours (10am till 3pm) he goes to Rosewalk Hospital Panchsheel; N-88 house number (just nearby flyover of Panchsheel and Panchshila Club on the mainroad of Panchsheel ). He has worked earlier as a senior consultant at Max superspeciality hospital Saket and Indraprastha Apollo hospital, Sarita vihar.

column21: Dr. Prachi, a dedicated pediatrician with a passion for providing compassionate and comprehensive care to newborns, infants, children, and adolescents. With years of experience and a commitment to staying abreast of the latest advancements in pediatric medicine, she strive to ensure the well-being and health of every child under his care.  Expertise and Specialization:  As a newborn and child specialist, she offers a wide range of services tailored to meet the unique needs of young patients. Her areas of expertise include:  Newborn Care: From routine check-ups to addressing concerns about feeding, sleep, and development, she provides attentive care to newborns and their families during this critical stage of life.  Childhood Immunizations: she emphasize the importance of vaccinations in preventing serious illnesses and work closely with parents to ensure their children receive the recommended immunizations on schedule.  Developmental Milestones: She monitors children's growth and development closely, offering guidance and support to parents as their child reaches important milestones.  Pediatric Consultations: Whether it's a routine wellness visit or a concern about a child's health, she provide thorough evaluations, accurate diagnoses, and personalized treatment plans to address a wide range of pediatric conditions.

Dr Rekha Mittal worked for 22 1/2 years in the field of Pediatrics & Later as Pediatric Neurologist in Armed forces Medical services. She took premature retirement when she was Senior Advisor (Pediatrics and Pediatric Neurology) & professor at Base Hospital, Delhi Cantt, & Army College of Medical Sciences, Delhi Cantt. She was the first Pediatric Neurologist of the Armed Forces and established Pediatric Neurology Services at Army Hospital ( Research and Referral) Delhi Cantt. Subsequently has worked in various prestigious hospitals in Delhi-NCR. Successfully ran an NGO: Roshni centre for special Children, where Pediatric Neurology Services were provided free of cost.

Dr. RG Holla is a Paediatrician currently practicing in New Delhi. He is adept and provides services for child health care. He is well versed in new-born care, premature baby care, New-born screening tests, vaccination for babies, treating babies with allergy, asthma and wheeze. His prime area of interest include care & treatment of new-born babies, childhood illness, neuro development care, growth & nutrition, and early stimulation. Dr. Holla is a proud member of Delhi Medical Council. He did his MBBS and MD (Paediatrics) from Armed Forces Medical College, Pune.

Dr Niraj Kumar Nikunj is a specialist in Paediatrics with a rich experience of over 13 years and is currently working at SCI International Hospital. He has expertise in managing all kinds of Neonatal cases including Extreme Prematurity, Low Birth Weight babies, Birth Asphyxia, Neonatal Seizures, etc. He also manages his OPD in Paediatrics and Neonatology including Vaccinations( Both Paediatric and Adult). He has handled numerous complex medical cases and is known for attention to detail, accurate diagnosis, and treating patients with empathy

column21: Dr Ganesh Jevalikar is a pediatric endocrinologist. After completion of his MD, he worked as a faculty in Department of Pediatrics at Sir J J Group of Hospitals, Mumbai. His current research topics include childhood diabetes, Turner syndrome and Graves’ disease. He runs a structured type 1 diabetes management programme at Medanta, which includes group education and parent’ support group.

column21: Dr. Vinay Kumar Rai is a highly skilled and dedicated Neonatologist with a passion for providing exceptional care to newborns. With years of experience in the field, he has become a recognized expert in neonatology, specializing in the care of critically ill premature infants and newborns with complex medical conditions. In addition to his clinical work, Dr. Rai is committed to contributing to the advancement of Neonatology through his research efforts. He has published articles in reputable medical journals, focusing on various topics related to neonatal care, long-term outcomes of premature infants, and strategies to improve neonatal healthcare delivery.

column21: Dr Richa Malik is a Pediatrician and neonatologist having extensive experience of handling common childhood ailments as well as diverse critical conditions in neonates and children. She has worked in many prestigious institutions like Safdarjung hospital New Delhi, Sanjay Gandhi postgraduate institute of medical sciences Lucknow, Sir Gangaram hospital New Delhi with an experience of more than 10 years. She did her fellowship in Neonatology from Sir Gangaram hospital.

Dr. Preeti Singh is a Paediatric Cardiologist , Pediatrician , is GOLD MEDALIST with a rich experience in management of children with diseases and specialises in treating children with heart diseases. All vaccinations and treatment of child disease like pneumonia, diarrhoea etc is treated. She has expertise in management of congenital heart disease of all age groups. She also specializes in diagnosis and management of heart diseases in foetal life.      Her special areas of expertise are Echocardiography and Interventional Paediatric Cardiology. Her areas of interest include 2D Echocardiography, Transoesophageal Echocardiography, Foetal Echocardiography, HOLTER, ECG, Management of Hypertension in children, Arrythmia, Non-invasive management of children with heart diseases, etc. She also has experience in Interventional Cardiology and can save numerous children with heart disease from undergoing cardiac surgery by doing Cardiac Catheterization Interventions like Balloon Pulmonary Valvuloplasty, Balloon Aortic Valvuloplasty, Atrial Septal Defect (ASD) Device Closure,Patent Ductus Arteriosus (PDA) Device Closure, Cath Study, etc. She has experience in successfully getting children treated with cardiac surgery too like Tetralogy of Fallot repair, Ventricular Septal Defect Closure, etc.     She is a Gold Medalist in DrNB superspeciality in PaediatricCardiology. Her paper was selected in “Best Imaging Category” in Paediatric Cardiology Society of India (PCSI) conference.     She completed her DrNB (Paediatric Cardiology) from Medanta - The Medicity, Gurugram. She has been previous associated with premier hospitals like Indraprastha Apollo Hospital, New Delhi, and Artemis Hospital, Gurugram. She has experience of Senior Residency in one of the best government hospitals in Delhi such as Kalawati Saran Children's Hospital, University College of Medical Sciences, New Delhi, etc.     She has attended many conferences and has presented variouspapers and posters in conferences. She also has many publications to her credit.

Dr. Nupur Gupta is a dedicated pediatrician with over a decade of experience in providing compassionate and comprehensive care to children in Delhi. After earning her medical degree, Dr. Gupta completed her residency in pediatrics, where she honed her skills in diagnosing and treating a wide range of childhood illnesses. She is known for her empathetic approach, ensuring that both children and their parents feel comfortable and well-informed during visits. Dr. Gupta is committed to promoting child health through preventive care, education, and community outreach. Her expertise and dedication make her a trusted healthcare provider in the Delhi community.

column10: King Edward Memorial Hospital and Seth Gordhandas Sunderdas Medical College
column21: Dr. Sunil Sareen, an accomplished pediatrician, holds an MBBS from the University of Mumbai (1996), and both DNB and MNAMS from the National Board of Examinations (2003, 2004). Additionally, he holds certifications in Neonatal Advanced Life Support and Advanced Pediatric Life Support. Apart from routine paediatric and neonatal healthcare, Dr. Sareen has extensive exposure to complex pediatric and neonatology cases and is skilled in IV cannulation, ET intubation, mechanical ventilation, ICU, and emergency management. Experienced in managing complex pediatric and neonatal cases, Dr. Sareen also has significant research on neonatal sepsis, including a published review article in the Journal of Post Graduate Medicine and Research.
